FuncDef: The display snmp-agent vacmgroup command displays all the configured View-based Access Control Model (VACM) groups. The display snmp-agent vacmgroup command displays all the configured View-based Access Control Model (VACM) groups.
ExtraInfo: To view the information about the group to which a User-based Security Model (USM) user is added, run the display snmp-agent vacmgroup command.
